data.text: @BriBri_BBC I do think she is very talented, yes

@BriBri_BBC Yes, and I also think in both cases she was unhappy that the writing didn't allow the shows to expand in what they would cover; she didn't want to keep doing the same old thing. Which to an extent is what TV is!

@BriBri_BBC I was stunned. I had no idea it was going to happen. I watched the season 4 premiere ep still expecting to see her; it was only then I realized that her character was really gone. Stopped watching the show not too long after that
